lead_paragraph: Real Madrid has been keeping quiet about Cristiano Ronaldo's injury, and his presence in the second leg of the Champions League semifinals is likely to remain a mystery until just before next week's game against Manchester City.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Remains Doubtful for 2nd Leg Against Man City
headline.main: Ronaldo Remains Doubtful for 2nd Leg Against Man City

snippet: Real Madrid has been keeping quiet about Cristiano Ronaldo's injury, and his presence in the second leg of the Champions League semifinals is likely to remain a mystery until just before next week's game against Manchester City....
